skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: azan prayer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Azan is called out by a mu'azzin from the mosque five times a day, traditionally from the minaret, summoning Muslims for obligatory (fard) prayer (salat).

To play Azan in alexa, Just enable the skill and say:
Alexa, open azan prayer
Alexa, play azan prayer
Alexa, ask azan prayer to play

If your facing any issues or need any improvements to the skill, please leave valuable feedback to us so it will really help us in updating the skill or leave us a review if you're enjoying our skill so it would help us in reaching a larger audience.

Now you can add 'Azan' skills to your daily routines
priv:
